doc.previous: has the same value for all the planets in the solar system Here P is the time taken for a planet to complete an orbit round the sun and a is the mean value between the maximum and minimum distances between the planet and sun
doc.after: Isaac Newton computed in his Philosophi Naturalis Principia Mathematica the acceleration of a planet moving according to Kepler s first and second law
